Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Cooking/Food
Status: New Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Fridays at 07:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: December 14, 2012

Nigel Slater's 12 Tastes of Christmas is a cookery series which sees Nigel Slater sharing the different flavours that for him make Christmas a truly delicious season.

(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33657)
